text: ParaNorman is a 2012 American animated comedy horror movie by Laika set in Massachusetts. It stars Kodi Smit-McPhee, Jodelle Ferland, Tucker Albrizzi, Anna Kendrick, Casey Affleck, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Leslie Mann, Jeff Garlin, Bernard Hill, Elaine Stritch, Tempestt Bledsoe, John Goodman, and Alex Borstein. It was released on August 17, 2012. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Animated Film. ==Other websites== * * * * * * * ParaNorman DVD & Blu-ray at Universal Studios Home Entertainment * Official novel website Category:2012 animated movies Category:2012 comedy movies Category:2012 horror movies Category:2012 LGBT movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:American animated movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American monster movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Ghost movies Category:LGBT comedy movies Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Zombie movies Category:Laika, LLC movies
title: ParaNorman
